title: MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White) | 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 Inch
descriptions:
Introducing the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage - the Awesome Arcade Hamster Home in a sleek White color! This spacious cage measures 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 inches and comes with all the essentials your hamster needs for a happy and healthy home.

Included with this cage are an exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook, and interior play tubes. Your furry friend will love the multi-level play space, deep base for bedding, and top door access for easy interaction. The removable upper cover allows for easy cleaning and maintenance.

With a modular design and standard play tube compatibility, you can customize and expand this cage to create the ultimate hamster playground. Best of all, no tools are required for assembly!

Backed by a 1-year Manufacturer's Warranty, you can trust in the quality and durability of this hamster cage. Treat your pet to the best with the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage - order yours today!
